body: It would be cool if we could watch these videos direct from the feed, like now display the direct linked image on mobile and desktop.
body_html: It would be cool if we could watch these videos direct from the feed, like now display the direct linked image on mobile and desktop.
title: Feature Request: YouTube, Gfycat, and Imgur gifv video play

body:
Youtube and gifs work.. kinda.

See +gifs - directly uploaded it's fine. Scroll down past the bunch of not directly uploaded ones to 'Making Noodles' and you'll see it playing in the feed, and will expand in feed when pressed.

Youtube works fine for videos without any licensed music but just needs some a little code tweaking to embed all like reddit does. I keep moaning about this to the devs lol see here : https://ruqqus.com/post/wbe/fix-youtube-embedding

I'm with you on adding it playable in the feed though, doesn't work with youtube yet, only images and gifs
body_html:
Youtube and gifs work.. kinda.

See +gifs - directly uploaded it's fine. Scroll down past the bunch of not directly uploaded ones to 'Making Noodles' and you'll see it playing in the feed, and will expand in feed when pressed.

Youtube works fine for videos without any licensed music but just needs some a little code tweaking to embed all like reddit does. I keep moaning about this to the devs lol see here : https://ruqqus.com/post/wbe/fix-youtube-embedding

I'm with you on adding it playable in the feed though, doesn't work with youtube yet, only images and gifs

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

body: For gifs and images it actually is already a feature, you have to click the thumbnail instead of an expando button which I agree is a bit confusing. I believe this is only true for approved domains however.
